name: Wheelin' Willie's road trip
description:
Wheelin' Willie's road trip

First ever unity app and gamejam submission

- You're a free wheelin' tire from trying to get back home to your friends.

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Use ASWD to move on the screen.

- Stay on the screen, if you can! ;)

- Watch out especially for big trucks and work cones!

- Cars are your friend. When they bump into you, they speed you up!

- Grass will slow you down.
